error.name: SYS_OK
error.descr: No error. The system is working fine
Pas d'erreur. Le système fonctionne bien

error.name: MOTOR_VOLTAGE_OVERLOAD
error.descr: Motor PWM is at its peak

error.name: LAMP_NOLOAD
error.descr: No load on the lamp - the light is not present

error.name: MOTOR_SPEED_LIMITED
error.descr: La vitesse du moteur est limitée

error.name: POS_SIG_SIN_SATURATED_UP
error.descr: The SIN position signal saturates on top

error.name: POS_SIG_SIN_SATURATED_DOWN
error.descr: The SIN position signal saturates on bottom

error.name: POS_SIG_COS_SATURATED_UP
error.descr: The COS position signal saturates on top

error.name: POS_SIG_COS_SATURATED_DOWN
error.descr: The COS position signal saturates on bottom

error.name: TEMPEATURE_TOO_HIGH
error.descr: The temperature is out of range

error.name: MOTOR_STOPPED_IN_LIMITATION
error.descr: The motor stopped in current limitation mode

error.name: SPEED_REF_NOT_ZERO
error.descr: The speed reference has to be reset to zero
La référence vitesse soit être remise à zéro

error.name: MOTOR_STOPPED_WHEN_STALLED
error.descr: The motor stopped while the rotor was stalled

error.name: WRONG_MOTOR_TYPE
error.descr: The motor is not of the right type
Le moteur n'est pas du bon type

error.name: CALIBRATION_DATA_MISSING
error.descr: Des capteurs ne sont pas clibrés

error.name: FACTORY_INFO_MISSING
error.descr: Le données de fabrication ne sont pas fixées

error.name: WORKSPACE_UNAVAILABLE
error.descr: The requested work space is not available

error.name: LAMP_OVERLOAD
error.descr: The Lamp consumption is outside boundary

error.name: MOTOR_EE_OVER_CURRENT
error.descr: Embedded electronics consumption out of limits

error.name: DRAG_ERROR_TOO_HIGH
error.descr: The drag error exceeds the boundaries

error.name: WRONG_MOTOR_TYPE
error.descr: The motor is not of the right type

error.name: MOTOR_OVERSPEED
error.descr: The motor is rotating to quickly

error.name: MOTOR_OVERTEMPERATURE
error.descr: The motor temperature is too high

error.name: PSU_VOLTAGE_TOO_LOW
error.descr: The input voltage is very too low
La tension d'alimentaton est trop basse

error.name: DRIVER_DEFECT_LOWER_SIDE
error.descr: The driver is flawed from lower side

error.name: DRIVER_DEFECT_HIGHER_SIDE
error.descr: The driver is flawed from higher side

error.name: PSU_VOLTAGE_TOO_HIGH
error.descr: The input voltage is very too high
